channel.title: Harlequinz eg0 on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Harlequinz eg0 on ZooBerry

item.title: Lego's Revamped Biome System
item.description: This is the second version of the biome system, which allows designers to create biomes with different codenames, instead of using a pre-defined and numbered registry.

item.title: Biome Shell
item.description: Alternatives have been released over the years, but this was the original modified biome system for Zoo Tycoon 2.

item.title: Dependency Master File
item.description: This is a compilation of common dependencies (required downloads) for ZT2 usermade animals.
